column4: can someone please tell me where i can find the log to figure out why my xdvdshrink is quitting unexpectedly?
have you tried invoking it from the command line?
-- at a terminal -- xdvd<TAB>
<TAB> means press the TAB key eh -- not type it all out like that :)
you might find some info in -- gnome-system-log
it should work regardless
what you could try doing is reinstalling xdvdshrink
ahh, you aliened -- thats the problem
please compile it from source to make sure its stable
i believe that is beyond my capability
its quite easy if you just give it a go -- its definitely not rocket science :)
download the source package -- i'll guide you through it
can i pm you?
you may -- but I prefer if we do it here -- that way other people can interact, help, learn, etc
ok i downloaded and extracted the src
are you at a command line?
just before we go anywhere- - just looked at the xdvdshrink page on sourceforce -- it seems to me that the package is only available for mandrake
can you confirm for me the name of the file you downloaded
yea, thats a mandrake package -- :(  can i suggest you use dvd::rip -- it's quite popular and works
ill give it atry but the last time i tried it their gui was very complex
dont let it put you off -- once you figure out how to do it once or twice, it'll be as easy as cake the next times around
thanks ill install it and play with it for a bit
